items.title: Harry says sacrifices by Nato troops in Afghanistan deserve 'respect'
items.description: The US president's comments have been condemned by international allies, including UK veterans and politicians.

items.title: High stakes but low expectations for Ukraine talks with Russia and US
items.description: Donald Trump is pushing hard for a peace deal - but major issues between Russia and Ukraine are still unresolved, writes Sarah Rainsford.

items.title: Danish PM in Greenland for 'show of support' after Trump threats
items.description: Mette Frederiksen visits the territory after weeks of tension over the US president's warnings that he could take control of it.

items.title: Frank Gardner: Not only Americans risked life and limb to serve in Afghanistan
items.description: Brits, Canadians and Danes were among those who saw the toughest fighting, writes the BBC's security correspondent.

items.title: Alleged drug kingpin and ex-Olympian Ryan Wedding arrested after years on the run
items.description: Wedding, who had been on the FBI's Ten Most Wanted Fugitives list, is accused of running a transnational drug trafficking operation.
